title: You run into your main on a hiking trip...
body:
What supplies do they have?

Example: {{champion:203}} Hunting guide and a lot of beef jerky

replies.body: {{champion:421}} I need to get the fuck out of here
{{champion:268}} {{champion:15}}  A small private army of sand soldiers with Sivir carrying Azir on her back.

{{champion:15}}: why am I carrying you when you can make the sand soldiers carry us in a chariot or something?

{{champion:268}}: CAUSE SHURIMA, NOW ON WARD!
{{champion:74}} he wont leave his turrets, so he waits tell he can build one and walk a little forward...

{{champion:133}} has sensible backpacking supplies, including a field guide to plants and animals, trail rations, her crossbow and some spare bolts, a knife, and some matches.  She's disquieted by the fact Valor keeps bringing her small animals to eat.
{{champion:10}} has a weather radio to keep track of the wind speed and direction, to help her fly around.  She does seem to enjoy teasing Morgana, who has to walk.
{{champion:25}} has a generous supply of trail mix, a nice walking stick, comfortable boots, and a paintball gun to take pot-shots at Kayle.
{{champion:112}} has a laptop, a smartphone, a tablet, a mobile WiFi hotspot, a solar-powered charger, and a golf cart to carry it all.  Morgana asks him if he even knows what the point of hiking is.

{{champion:89}} 
No supplies, but she does have a house there O.O

{{champion:43}} "Legend has it that Ao Shin roams these mountains...."

Good luck finding him....
{{champion:41}} *Pulls out a knife* And' over the jerky n' dried fruits and nobody as' to get hurt!
{{champion:62}} the cloths on his back and a staff, shrunk down to the size of a toothpick, behind his ear.
{{champion:102}} Nothing. She lives off the land just the same as when she traveled with her father.
{{champion:68}} : A freaking mech that can get us out of this hell hole

{{champion:201}} 

Goat milk and cheese, a massive shield, and a Poro companion
